attributes.action: Introduce appropriate compensation re the wrongful application of EU - single market finance - Policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the PM/Govt to abide by the EU Charter of Fundamental & UK Convention of Rights re legally acquired property/loss of property, compensation in good time & legal representation.
I have TWO endowment mortgages but I'm denied ALL of the above. It is assumed I'm a financial criminal/terrorist with NO IDENTITY as I'm NOT IN the UK.
I ask the PM/Govt to
Investigate the wrongful application of EU Policy as I'm debt-ridden for life & bankers are flush.
Provide compensation to cover extended interest payments & loss of savings.
Create an INDEPENDENT ARBITOR with a relevant remit - NO TIME & NO COST/DAMAGE limits.
Tell us HOW this achieved our financial security.
NOT apply economic sanctions on citizens who have migrated for work.
Ensure consumers of UK services NOT IN the UK receive EQUAL TREATMENT.
STOP the credit rating at a UK address(12-18 months) ID Check as it is illegal.
Ensure EVERY person has access to legal counsel.
Cease ALL discrimination based on WHERE A PERSON LIVES.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the block caps.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
